values.content: =What are the keywords in the job description? Rank the keyword from the greatest importance to least importance according to this job description: {{ $json.jobDescription }}

json.Job Description:
Monitoring the creation and execution of online marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility, drive traffic, and increase sales.
  • + Create and implement digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, lead generation, sales and analytics reporting.
  • + Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various platforms
  • + Checking content creation for digital platforms including websites, blogs, social media, and email marketing.
  • + Optimizing website content for search engines and managing paid search campaigns to improve traffic.
  • + Manage and allocate the digital marketing budget effectively to maximize ROI.
  • + Keeping updated with digital marketing trends, tools, and technologies.

This is a Full Time Contractual (FTC) role for a period of 6 months

Experienced in Google,Facebook,Programmatic,Affiliates,and digital mobile marketing channels. . 1-3 years of experience with a B2C consumer tech / e-commerce platform,in a digital marketing role. Advanced computer literacy in Microsoft Office applications,especially MS Excel.

Nyasa Enterprise is looking for Digital Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Build, plan and implement the overall digital marketing strategy
  2. Manage the strategy
  3. Manage and train the rest of the team
  4. Stay up to date with the latest technology and best practices
  5. Manage all digital marketing channels
  6. Measure ROI and KPIs
  7. Prepare and manage a digital marketing budget
  8. Oversee all the company's social media accounts
  9. Manage and improve online content, considering SEO and Google Analytics
  10. Build an inbound marketing plan
  11. Forecast sales performance trends
  12. Motivate the digital marketing team to achieve goals
  13. Monitor competition and provide suggestions for improvement

* Build, plan and implement the overall digital marketing strategy.
* Manage and improve online content, considering SEO, Google Analytics & Social media marketing.
*Conduct an SEO optimization including keyword research, content optimization.

Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels such as social media, email, SEO, PPC, and display advertisingAnalyze and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns using tools such as Google Analytics, SEMRush, and HootsuiteIdentify and implement optimization strategies to improve campaign performance and ROIManage and update the company website and other digital propertiesCollaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure brand consistency across all digital touchpoints

Strong analytical skills and experience with Google Analytics and other digital marketing toolsExcellent communication and interpersonal skills

Were looking for a sharp,analytical,and ambitious Performance Marketing Specialist to help us drive paid growth across Amazon (AMS) and Google Ads.This is an excellent opportunity for someone with 02 years of hands-on experience (including internships or freelance projects) who is eager to learn,experiment,and grow in the performance marketing space

Job Title: Business Development Executive (Female) - Digital Marketing .

We are looking for a dynamic and result-oriented Business Development Executive (Female) to join our growing Digital Marketing Agency in Chennai

Experience: 0 - 4 years . Employment Type: Full-time

Male candidates only.

Experience Range : 0-2+ years Freshers with good Digital Marketing. 6 days working . Only immediate joining candidates

Candidate must have experience in digital marketing,SEO,Google Ads,performance marketing,brand visibility,and online engagement.

Experience candidate from Real Estate industry.

. 6 months of internship experience in digital marketing operations preferred .

Bachelor s degree in Marketing,Digital Media,or a related field

Responsibilities:

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams on campaigns & strategies for marketing on different platforms and work on automation

* Manage social media presence & online branding

Opportunity to grow into a full-time role.

Solid understanding of content trends,platform algorithms,and digital performance metrics.  . Strong communication,negotiation,and project management skills.  . Proficiency with tools like Meta Business Manager,Google Analytics,and related platforms

Bachelor s degree with 0-2 years of experience in Email Marketing . Great communication skills and experience working with global stakeholders

Experience using Eloqua or similar Marketing Automation tool is preferred but not mandatory . .

Requirements:  . Bachelors degree in Marketing,Communications,Business,or a related field. 2+ years of experience in digital marketing or a related role. Proficiency with digital marketing tools (e.g.,Google Ads,Meta Business Suite,SEO tools,email marketing platforms). Strong knowledge of SEO / SEM,Google Analytics,and CRM software.

must be able to create video with content

must have the knowledge of advertising

Preferred candidate profile .

good at social media marketing Eg- Insta,face book etc

Basic knowledge of HTML,CMS (WordPress),and technical SEO. . Analytical mindset with problem-solving skills. . Certification in Digital Marketing / SEO (preferred)

Experience: 0 - 3 years . Age Group: 20 - 25 years. Education: UG / PG ( Marketing or Computer Science background preferred)

json.Job Title: Digital Marketing Executive || Noida || 0.6-2 years - YES IT Labs LLC
json.Job Description:
Graduate in Marketing,Business,Mass Communication,or a related field

. Good written English and document formatting skills

. Detail-oriented and organized with a willingness to learn.

Good communication skills. .

Job Title: Sr Digital Marketing Executive

Location: Noida

Company Overview

Digiversal is a fast-growing academic venture based out of Noida and having multiple liaison networks across the world. Connect with us to discover brilliance within yourself and to experience a neo-modern ideology of Live, Work, Play and Learn with stellar career growth.

Digiversal is a hub for creative and passionate individuals who strive for excellence. We are committed to guiding students across the globe through their learning journey, helping them succeed in academics and in life! We present a unique combination of academic consulting and digital technology solutions. We aim to promote as well as nurture academic learning, professional development, and intellectual excellence while delivering high- quality, authentic, and trustworthy academic content writing services globally. Our vision is to maintain our status of being the most preferred and trusted brand in the industry, which excels in client satisfaction and retention.

Job Summary:

We are looking for an ideal candidate who will be supporting the Assistant manager with their strong technical and analytical SEO skills. The mission of a Sr. SEO (Search Engine Optimization) Executive is to maximize the volume of inbound organic traffic from search engines to our business website and to maintain the website health in search engines through regular analysis through technical tools. This will be accomplished through a combination of on-page and off-page techniques, analysis and technical SEO upgradations, including link-building, content strategy, information architecture, and more.

As Sr. SEO (Search Engine Optimization) Executive, you are responsible to mentor the Off-page members and suggest them the best link building techniques for gaining rankings media and other digital media campaigns. You should grab the attention of customers and market the products and services.

If you have the ability to utilize the organizational resources optimally for the business promotion activities, we would like to meet you.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Hands on Experience of Off page activities (must be able to perform all off-page tasks successfully like info graphics submission, PPT submission, Audio/Podcast submission, Video submission, Image submission, including article insertion /press release/directory submissions, RSS feeds, forum postings, blog posts, social bookmarking and commenting on social networks.).
  • Understanding of On-page & tools, content optimization, Meta tags etc. to boost rankings.
  • Understanding of how blogging, press releases, social media, and related strategies go hand-in-hand with SEO.
  • Experience in building inbound organic search traffic and improving SERPS.
  • Working knowledge of current, past and projected trend in SEO industry.
  • Knowledge of SEO best practices w.r.t Content Marketing.
  • Knowledge of White Hat and Black Hat SEO optimization.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and handle clients.
  • Should possess excellent communication skills.
  • Good in SEO, SMO work, and Promotional Activities
  • Keep pace with SEO industry trends and developments including best practices to handle Google updates.
  • Review & analyze website to find areas of improvement.
  • Optimize websites to rank higher for relevant keywords in the organic search result.
  • Awareness about various content marketing platforms of the Market Research Industry.
  • Manage the ORM of the brand and work on creating a positive image of the Brand online along with mitigating the negative reviews.
  • Effective in troubleshooting, SEO, and ranking related issues.

Qualifications:

  • Demonstrated SEO experience of at least 3-5 years.
  • Experience with Google's Keyword Tool.
  • Proven success in link building.
  • Experience in building inbound organic search traffic and improving SERPs.
  • Basic HTML Knowledge.
  • Candidate must also possess good English communication skills (written and oral).
  • 2+ years of working kowledge of Google Analytics, Google Search Console Tool, Ahrefs & SEMRush.
  • 2+ Years of working experience in On page SEO and Technical SEO implementations.
  • Guest posting experience.

Why Join Us?

  • Opportunity to work with an innovative and growing company.
  • A dynamic work environment with learning and career growth opportunities.
  • Work with a talented and experienced team.
  • Competitive compensation and ample opportunities for growth.
  • Exposure to diverse projects in the digital marketing landscape.

Freshers who have completed Digital Marketing training from Internshala are encouraged to apply

Skills Required: . Digital Marketing training from Internshala (Mandatory).

Basic knowledge of SEO,SEM,and Social Media Marketing. Creative mindset and good communication skills.

Responsibilities:

* Develop digital marketing strategies, execute campaigns.

* Create engaging content, manage social media presence.

* Analyze results, report findings.

* Utilize SEO techniques, optimize website performance.

6 months of experience as marketing analyst,or in digital marketing,or a related role . Strong command of written English and excellent communication skills .

We're looking for a talented and results-oriented Digital Marketing Specialist to join our growing team. You'll be responsible for managing and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across Google Ads and Facebook Ads, while also collaborating with internal teams to develop effective marketing funnels.


Responsibilities:


1. Manage and optimize Google Ads and Facebook Ads campaigns, including keyword research, ad copywriting, landing page optimization, and budget allocation.


2. Analyze campaign performance data and make data-driven adjustments to improve conversion rates and ROI.


3. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in paid advertising platforms.


4. Collaborate with the design team to create high-converting landing pages and ad creatives that resonate with the target audience.


5. Work with the content marketing team to develop marketing funnels that nurture leads and drive conversions.


6. Track campaign performance against key metrics and report findings to stakeholders.


7. Identify and implement new strategies to improve overall marketing effectiveness.

- Bachelor s degree in Marketing,Communications,or a related field (preferred)

Proven work experience as a Digital Marketing Executive or similar role

- Experience with SEO,SEM,PPC campaigns,and social media marketing

Competitive salary based on experience and skills

Wanted digital marketing executives
Exp - 0- 5 years
Location: Hyderabad, bengaluru

Whatsapp us on 7093357755, we will get back to you.

Ram
7093357755

Responsibilities:

* Manage digital campaigns from ideation to execution

* Optimize website for search engines, generate leads

* Analyze performance metrics and provide insights

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams on strategy development

Preferred Qualifications: . Bachelors degree in Marketing,Mass Communication,Design,or related fields.

Proven experience in digital marketing,social media management,or content creation . Strong understanding of branding and audience engagement . Hands-on skills in tools like Canva,Adobe Suite,Meta Business Suite,or similar platforms.
Preferred candidate profile . .

Responsibilities:

  • Develop & execute digital strategies using SEO, social media & Google Analytics.
  • Conduct keyword research, on-page/off-page optimization & link building.
Office cab/shuttle

Bachelors or Masters degree in Marketing,Communications,Business,or related field

Preferred candidate profile

Minimum 2 years of hands-on digital marketing experience

Deliver minimum 300 qualified leads per month

Data-driven mindset and experience with traffic / lead performance analytics
Track campaign performance Freshers 1 year of experience in marketing or a related field

Position Title: Digital Marketing Executive


Location: Madhapur, Hyderabad (Near to Madhapur D-Mart)


Experience: 2 to 3 years


Job Summary:


We are looking for someone to help plan and run our online marketing efforts. This role involves working from our office and the shift is from 2 PM to 10 PM IST.


Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or related field (any graduation).


Role & responsibilities:


Must have:


  • Strong written, verbal communication and presentation skills.
  • Good understanding of online advertising, digital marketing, email marketing concepts and techniques.
  • Knowledge on Using of Hubspot or similar application will be added advantage
  • Familiarity with social media platforms and digital marketing tools.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights.
  • Creative thinking and problem-solving skills.
  • Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
  • Highly organized with excellent attention to detail.

Good to have:


  • SEO/SEM Skills
  • Work with our teams to create landing pages and improve the user experience.
  • Web Development
  • Prior internship or work experience in digital marketing is a big plus for candidates with less experience.

What We Offer:


  • Competitive salary and benefits.
  • Opportunity to work with leading technologies.
  • Supportive and collaborative work environment.
  • Career growth and development opportunities.
  • Hands-on experience in digital marketing.
  • Exposure to the tech industry.
  • Networking opportunities.

How to Apply: Send your resume and a cover letter to divya.namburi@pronteff.com with the


subject line Digital Marketing Specialist Application.

Required Skills: .

Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience.

Proven experience (24 years) in digital marketing or a related field. . Strong understanding of performance marketing,conversion,and online customer acquisition.

The Digital Marketing Manager position is based out of our head office in Bangalore, and the specialist will own the devising and implementing of SEO and paid marketing strategies for multiple hotel customers and help them get the maximum return on investment on their spend.
Responsibilities:
The goal of the Digital Marketing Manager will be to ensure that our customers get a good return on investment on their digital spending. The Specialist will:
  • Project manage and ensure the delivery of high-quality digital marketing services to our customers.
  • Coordinate with customers to understand their business and marketing strategies.
  • Devise a strategy and a plan to help them achieve their goals. Review the plan with the customers and get their buy-in.
  • Implement the plan and work with internal teams to get parts of the plan implemented.
  • Create reports on the success of the campaigns and review the performance with the customer.
Skills Required:
  • Graduate degree in Engineering or Business. MBA is a plus.
  • 0-2 years of prior account management and digital marketing experience required. Knowledge of SEO, Google Ads, Display Ads, and social media ads is required. This includes the ability to research keywords, identify the best ones to target.
  • Ability to measure and report the effectiveness of campaigns effectively.
  • Excellent analytical, communication, and presentation skills. Ability to convince both internal and external stakeholders. Ability to create engaging presentations.
  • Ability to create strong business cases for digital marketing.
  • Knowledge of analytics tools (Google Analytics, Google Ads tools, MS Excel, SEMrush, etc.).

Role: Support day-to-day digital marketing tasks across SEO, social media, and paid campaigns.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist in content creation and scheduling for social media
  • Help with keyword research and on-page SEO
  • Support paid ad campaign setup and reporting
  • Monitor competitors and research marketing trends
  • Learn and grow with hands-on digital tools and platforms

Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with sales team on lead generation strategies
  • Monitor analytics & optimize performance
  • Manage social media presence & campaigns
  • Develop digital marketing plans & execute SEO tactics
Work from home

Lead Height is looking for Digital Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Build, plan and implement the overall digital marketing strategy
  2. Manage the strategy
  3. Manage and train the rest of the team
  4. Stay up to date with the latest technology and best practices
  5. Manage all digital marketing channels

We're seeking an experienced Digital Marketing Manager with fresher or Experience in the field, skilled in SEO, Meta Ads, Google Ads, and team leadership. You’ll manage 2–3projects at a time with bonus points if you’ve worked on large-scale campaigns

The ideal candidate should have a strong grasp of current marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution. . Key Responsibilities: .

Job Title: Digital Marketing - Executive
Location: Kolkata, West Bengal
Company: Orient Gems & Ornaments Pvt. Ltd.
Experience Required: 2 to 4 Years
Travel Requirement: Mandatory (domestic travel to showrooms, exhibitions, and vendor locations)
Industry: Retail / Gems & Jewellery

Job Summary:

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Digital Marketing Executive to manage and optimize our online presence, campaigns, and brand visibility. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in the Retail/FMCG/Media industry, with a proven track record in executing performance-based digital strategies. This role demands travel to various retail locations, exhibitions, and industry events to ensure brand consistency across platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

Digital Strategy & Execution

  • Develop, execute, and manage multi-channel digital marketing campaigns across platforms (Google, Meta, YouTube, etc.).
  • Oversee the planning and delivery of digital content calendars, promotions, and product launches.
  • Handle SEO/SEM, PPC campaigns, social media marketing, and email marketing.
  • Manage and update the companys website and e-commerce platforms (if applicable).

Social Media Management

  • Build and grow brand presence on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and YouTube.
  • Create engaging and visually appealing posts, stories, and reels in coordination with the creative team.
  • Monitor social media trends, hashtags, and competitor activities.

Performance & Analytics

  • Track, report, and analyze campaign performance using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and third-party dashboards.
  • Generate weekly/monthly reports on KPIs, ROI, traffic, conversions, and engagement metrics.
  • Implement A/B testing and conversion rate optimization strategies.

Branding & Content

  • Coordinate with photographers, designers, and videographers to create product-centric and lifestyle content.
  • Ensure brand tone and aesthetics align across all digital platforms.
  • Plan and execute influencer tie-ups and collaborations to enhance brand visibility.

Travel & Coordination

  • Travel to showrooms, events, and exhibitions to gather content, understand customer insights, and ensure marketing alignment.
  • Coordinate with store managers and regional teams for campaign rollouts and event promotions.

Requirements:

  • MBA preferred/Bachelors degree in Marketing, Digital Media, Communications, or related field.
  • 2 - 4 years of digital marketing experience in the retail/fmcg/media industry.
  • Strong understanding of SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, and e-commerce.
  • Hands-on experience with tools like Canva, Photoshop, Meta Business Suite, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, etc.
  • Fluent in English, Hindi, and preferably Bengali.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Willingness and ability to travel frequently.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of Jewellery trends, festive season marketing, and regional customer behavior.
  • Basic understanding of product photography and visual merchandising.
  • Experience in What's App marketing and CRM-based campaigns.

Interested Candidates Please Drop Your Resume On hr@orientjewellers.co.in or Whats App 8373099937

The Digital Marketing Manager position is based out of our head office in Bangalore, and the specialist will own the devising and implementing of SEO and paid marketing strategies for multiple hotel customers and help them get the maximum return on investment on their spend.
Responsibilities:
The goal of the Digital Marketing Manager will be to ensure that our customers get a good return on investment on their digital spending. The Specialist will:
  • Project manage and ensure the delivery of high-quality digital marketing services to our customers.
  • Coordinate with customers to understand their business and marketing strategies.
  • Devise a strategy and a plan to help them achieve their goals. Review the plan with the customers and get their buy-in.
  • Implement the plan and work with internal teams to get parts of the plan implemented.
  • Create reports on the success of the campaigns and review the performance with the customer.
Skills Required:
  • Graduate degree in Engineering or Business. MBA is a plus.
  • 0-2 years of prior account management and digital marketing experience required. Knowledge of SEO, Google Ads, Display Ads, and social media ads is required. This includes the ability to research keywords, identify the best ones to target.
  • Ability to measure and report the effectiveness of campaigns effectively.
  • Excellent analytical, communication, and presentation skills. Ability to convince both internal and external stakeholders. Ability to create engaging presentations.
  • Ability to create strong business cases for digital marketing.
  • Knowledge of analytics tools (Google Analytics, Google Ads tools, MS Excel, SEMrush, etc.).

Job Title: Digital Marketing - Executive
Location: Kolkata, West Bengal
Company: Orient Gems & Ornaments Pvt. Ltd.
Experience Required: 2 to 4 Years
Travel Requirement: Mandatory (domestic travel to showrooms, exhibitions, and vendor locations)
Industry: Retail / Gems & Jewellery

Job Summary:

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Digital Marketing Executive to manage and optimize our online presence, campaigns, and brand visibility. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in the Retail/FMCG/Media industry, with a proven track record in executing performance-based digital strategies. This role demands travel to various retail locations, exhibitions, and industry events to ensure brand consistency across platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

Digital Strategy & Execution

  • Develop, execute, and manage multi-channel digital marketing campaigns across platforms (Google, Meta, YouTube, etc.).
  • Oversee the planning and delivery of digital content calendars, promotions, and product launches.
  • Handle SEO/SEM, PPC campaigns, social media marketing, and email marketing.
  • Manage and update the companys website and e-commerce platforms (if applicable).

Social Media Management

  • Build and grow brand presence on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and YouTube.
  • Create engaging and visually appealing posts, stories, and reels in coordination with the creative team.
  • Monitor social media trends, hashtags, and competitor activities.

Performance & Analytics

  • Track, report, and analyze campaign performance using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and third-party dashboards.
  • Generate weekly/monthly reports on KPIs, ROI, traffic, conversions, and engagement metrics.
  • Implement A/B testing and conversion rate optimization strategies.

Branding & Content

  • Coordinate with photographers, designers, and videographers to create product-centric and lifestyle content.
  • Ensure brand tone and aesthetics align across all digital platforms.
  • Plan and execute influencer tie-ups and collaborations to enhance brand visibility.

Travel & Coordination

  • Travel to showrooms, events, and exhibitions to gather content, understand customer insights, and ensure marketing alignment.
  • Coordinate with store managers and regional teams for campaign rollouts and event promotions.

Requirements:

  • MBA preferred/Bachelors degree in Marketing, Digital Media, Communications, or related field.
  • 2 - 4 years of digital marketing experience in the retail/fmcg/media industry.
  • Strong understanding of SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, and e-commerce.
  • Hands-on experience with tools like Canva, Photoshop, Meta Business Suite, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, etc.
  • Fluent in English, Hindi, and preferably Bengali.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Willingness and ability to travel frequently.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of Jewellery trends, festive season marketing, and regional customer behavior.
  • Basic understanding of product photography and visual merchandising.
  • Experience in What's App marketing and CRM-based campaigns.

Interested Candidates Please Drop Your Resume On hr@orientjewellers.co.in or Whats App 8373099937
